as.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwrite by asChild
as.description_zh: 此组件应呈现为的元素或组件。可以被 asChild 覆盖

asChild.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 更改作为子元素传递的默认渲染元素，合并其道具和行为。

type.description: Determines whether one or multiple items can be opened at the same time.
type.description_zh: 确定是否可以同时打开一个或多个项目。

defaultValue.description: The value of the item to expand when initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control the state of the items.
defaultValue.description_zh: 最初呈现时要展开的项的值。在不需要控制项目状态时使用。

value.description: The controlled value of the item to expand. Must be binded with v-model.
value.description_zh: 要展开的项的控制值。必须与 v-model 绑定。

collapsible.description: When type is "single", allows closing content when clicking trigger for an open item.
collapsible.description_zh: 当类型为“single”时，允许在单击打开项的触发器时关闭内容。

disabled.description: When `true`, prevents the user from interacting with the accordion and all its items.
disabled.description_zh: 如果为 'true'，则阻止用户与手风琴及其所有项进行交互。

dir.description: The reading direction of the accordion when applicable. If omitted, assumes LTR (left-to-right) reading mode.
dir.description_zh: 手风琴的阅读方向（如适用）。如果省略，则假定 LTR（从左到右）阅读模式。
